LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_AllowDownloads: 允許從遠端資料庫下載遺跡
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_AllowUploads: 允許上傳你的基地到遠端資料庫
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_CacheSize: 限制本地端快取大小為
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_AllowDownloadsToolt: 若關閉此選項，將不會移除任何已下載資料。
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_AllowUploadsTooltip: 建議開啟此選項以協助豐富資料庫，取得更多有趣的基地設計。每次遊戲周期上傳的資料量應該不會超過 MB(megabytes) 等級。
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_CacheSizeTooltip: 當達到限制的容量時，模此會繼續下載新的遺跡藍圖，並移除舊有的。
LanguageData.RealRuins_ModOptions_OfflineModeTooltip: 此模式會刪除所有從遠端下載的資料，且將不會再進行任何上傳及下載的動作。然而，你曾經創建過的基地仍然會儲存在本地端，用以生成你遊戲中的遺跡.
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_DensityTT: 在 100x100 的單位內平均可生成的遺跡數量
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_SizeTT: 遺跡大小在輸入值的 50% ~ 150% 之間隨機選擇
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_DeteriorationTT: 這個值額外增加了每一個單元被破壞的機率，不會影響其它單元剩餘的生命值。預設值是 0，填入最大值遺跡將一無所有
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_ScavengersTT: 設為 0 將得到完整未被掠奪過的遺跡
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_CostLimitTT: 所有高於設定價格的物品都會被尋寶者奪走
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_DisableHaulablesTT: 所有可搬運的物資都不會出現，但是仍然可以找到家具
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_WallsAndDoorsOnlyTT: 將會移除所有意義上不是牆或門的物件，且金子打造的建築也會被移除，不會有奇蹟
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_ClaimableTT: 不可佔領的結構無法修復或拆除
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_EnableProximityTT: 到定居點的距離會影響生成參數：離定居點越近，廢墟越密集，但被掠奪的越多
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_StartWithoutRuins: 起始地圖不會生成遺跡
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_StartWithoutRuinsTT: 起始地圖不會生成遺跡，後續的遺跡生成由設定的參數決定
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredRuins: {0}已經抵達廢棄的基地遺跡，準備開始尋寶行動。
LanguageData.RealRuins.CaravanFoundRuins: 在旅途中，{0}在附近發現了幾座保存良好的老舊建築。其中必定有些值錢的東西。但同時也許是一個機械軍團的基地、野生動物的巢穴或是掠奪者的基地 - 這些建築物如此完整一定有它的原因在
LanguageData.RealRuins_MapOptions_CaravanReformingTT: 通常，在探索遺跡時，即時商隊重組功能會被關閉。你需要手動的探索遺跡並將你想要的物品主動拾起或放置到馱畜身上，然後往邊境移動來進入大地圖，即使現在地圖上已經是安全的。但如果你希望允許即時重組商隊，請啟用此設定
LanguageData.DeterioratedArtDescription: 這件物品已經太過老舊且損壞。你可以肯定它曾經是一件美麗的藝術品，但現在已經無法辨別它究竟是什麼了。
LanguageData.RealRuins.NoMoreEnemies: 附近似乎以杳無人煙，你可以安全的收拾物品並離開。(允許即時重組商隊)
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI0: 一小群疑似軍事用途的建築。可能是軍械庫或小型運輸軍事基地。它也許有幾個陣地武器和少量(<1x)的士兵。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI1: 一個很小的軍事前哨站，幾個房間，幾座砲塔，幾名士兵。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI2: 為開採資源、狩獵或作為轉運點而設立的臨時營地。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI3: 一個繁榮的大城市。儘管它通常沒有巨大的牆城或大量的陣地武器，但它可以在受到攻擊時請求強大的增援。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI4: 這些建築內可能存在很多工作台、原料以及產品。但很可能會配備精良的守衛。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI5: 研發中心負責生產比普通工廠更複雜、更昂貴的產品。除了可能配備精良的守衛之外，一旦你決定進攻，守衛就會請求增援。
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI6: A group of buildings focused primarily on power production.
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI7: A large military base with lots of stationary weapons, several dozens of personnel and reinforcements ready to arrive.
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI8: From distance it looks like a large hangar filled with goods. And a lot of guards.
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI9: Small building which looks like a communication center. Probably just a temporary military camp with just a few guards.
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI10: Remainings of some buildings, bits of furniture, broken workbenches, pipes and metal bars. You can't tell what it was long ago, everything left is just empty ruins.
LanguageData.RealRuins.DescPOI11: Heavily guarded stronghold. Extremely well defended with tons of stationary weapons, troops and reinforcements.
LanguageData.RealRuins.POINowRuined: Once this place was full of life, but now it's abandoned, no one knows why. So better beware of all kinds of danger.
LanguageData.LetterCaravanEnteredUnownedPOI: {0} has arrived at destination. Proceed with caution.
LanguageData.LetterTransportPodsArrivedInUnownedPOI: Transport pods have arrived at destination.
LanguageData.LetterTransportPodsAttackedPOI: Transport pods have arrived at destination. Attack has begun.
LanguageData.LetterLabelTransportPodsArrivedAtRuins: Transport pods have arrived at ruins
LanguageData.LetterTransportPodsArrivedAtRuins: Transport pods have arrived at ruins
LanguageData.RealRuins.BiomeFilteringTT: Exclude maps with missing or mismatching biome
LanguageData.RealRuins.CostFilteringTT: Exclude maps with too low cost (lower than average "empty" map)
LanguageData.RealRuins.AreaFilteringTT: Exclude maps with too small area and too low items count
LanguageData.RealRuins.NeedsGameInProgress: You have to be in an ongoing game to use this menu
LanguageData.RealRuins.CaravanReformTooltip: Way of caravan reforming in Real Ruins events. "Automatic" is the same way as caravan is formed on your home map. "Instant" allows instant reform via button on the world map. "Manual" is for manual items pickup and leaving via map edge.
LanguageData.RealRuins.ForceMultiplierTT: Tune this to make ruins event more or less difficult
LanguageData.RealRuins.AbsoluteWealthCapTT: Determines absolute wealth cap for ruins events. Wooden walls and doors are not counted against total wealth.
LanguageData.RealRuins.LeaveVanillaRuinsTT: If checked, both real ruins and vanilla ruins will be spawned
